Contents of text block. Supports markdow:
I am a data analytics and business intelligence professional with education in computer science and geography and a passion for geospatial data science. 
As a senior data analytics manager, my mission is creating scalable and effective data analytics and business intelligence solutions. I lead and train people in various job capacities to adopt new data tools and help them get empowered with data. 
As  a geographer and geospatial data scientist, I am focused on using geocomputation with R, Python and FOSS4G to solve urban and other spatial issues
I write more about geospatial data science on my blog: [taraskaduk.com](https://taraskaduk.com/)
Only most relevant industry experience is listed. For a full list of all work experience, please visit [my LinkedIn profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/taraskaduk/)
